short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get desktop notifications when people whose opinion you care about comment on Product Hunt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions add a new "Follow comments" button on Product Hunt users' profile page.

If you follow comments for an user, you will receive a desktop notification when they add a comment (with a 10 minutes maximum delay).

You can click the extension to see the latest comments from people you follow and manage your followings list.

If you want to avoid being disturbed for some time, you can deactivate desktop notifications.
